scripts.seed:db: knex migrate:rollback --env test && knex migrate:latest --env test && NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run --env test
scripts.seed:dev:db: knex migrate:rollback --env development && knex migrate:latest --env development && NODE_ENV=development knex seed:run --env development
scripts.seed:prod: DB_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex seed:run --env production
scripts.migrate:latest:prod: DB_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex migrate:latest --env production
scripts.migrate:rollback:prod: DB_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex migrate:rollback --env production
